outputs.output_descr: The project attempts to create alternative voice channels for the poor through the use of ICT to ensure that they are able to exercise and demand for their rights while State institutions meet their obligations to respect, protect and fulfill them. Throught the establishment of multi-point e-resource in key regions of Philippine archipelago, geographical barriers are substantially reduced. Selected schools of public administration will be capacitated and connected as a nationwide network to make information and knowledge accessible to local citizens especially the poor and disadvantage sector in remote and impoverished communities.

project_descr: Electronic Connection to Access and Network iNFormation and kNowledge for Governance Effectiveness and Sustainability
project_title: Electronic Connection to Access and Network iNformation
